ValidationRule.description: Requires Trial Status to be set to Post-trial when Actual Trial End Date is entered. And Requires Actual Trial End Date to be filled when Trial Status is set to Post-trial
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), OR( ISCHANGED(Actual_Trial_End_Date__c), ISCHANGED(Trail__c), ISNEW() ), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Trail__c, "Post-trial"), ISBLANK(Actual_Trial_End_Date__c) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Actual_Trial_End_Date__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Trail__c, "Post-trial")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: SE Engagement Status is required to be post-trial when updating Tech Win - Please set SE Engagement Status to post-trial and capture actual trial end date.
